actions.text: On agreeing to the Roukema amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 406 - 13 (Roll No. 149).

description: Amendment requires the FDIC to conduct a study regarding the Bank Insurance Fund and the Savings Association Insurance Fund.
purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 8 in part 2 of House Report 105-531, to require the FDIC to conduct a study regarding the the Bank Insurance Fund and the Savings Association Insurance Fund.
